change_logs: Smart lists! Preview all your tasks in an organized way
Repeating tasks! Create tasks which will automatically repeat on your selected schedule
New "Calendar" and "Upcoming" and "Today" home screen widgets
Nagging mode! Receive multiple notifications in a row until you open the app
Hide Completed Tasks! Optional toggle to show only most recently completed tasks
iOS Reminders Integration! Import and categorize all your iOS reminders.
Default Notifications! Select which notifications will be automatically enabled for newly created tasks.
Add tasks from home screen! Long press on Finale To Do icon from your home screen to quickly add a new task.
Hide in Smart Lists: Select which personal lists will contribute tasks to Smart Lists.
Grayscale Theme: Beautiful white dominant theme for light interface connoisseurs.
